title: "META HAS PROMOTED HOMOPHOBIC, RACIST, AND FAKE NEWS POSTS" - YouTube
snippet: Elisabetta Piccolotti mentions a study by Professor Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino demonstrating how Meta favored homophobic, racist, or fake news posts over content from politicians, influencing elections.
description: A YouTube video discusses a study by Professor Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino, which demonstrates how Meta allegedly promoted homophobic, racist, and fake news posts, influencing elections.

title: L’articolo 21 nella gabbia di Facebook - Terzogiornale
Il Premio Rimini Mundi a sette ambasciatori del congressuale - lapiazzarimini.it
Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil - Vera.ai
snippet: Reports on Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil in October 2025, including research on analyzing political discourse using large language models and a roundtable discussion on data access in the DSA era.
description: This Vera.ai post reports on Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil in October 2025, covering topics such as analyzing political discourse using large language models and data access in the DSA era, which are directly relevant to his research.

title: Cracking the code: social data access and the DSA's impact on disinformation research
snippet: Article by Massimo Terenzi and Fabio Giglietto discussing the impact of the Digital Services Act (DSA) on social media research, highlighting both the progress and the limitations in accessing platform data for studying disinformation.
description: This article, co-authored by Fabio Giglietto, explores the impact of the Digital Services Act (DSA) on social media research and data access for studying disinformation.

title: Cambio di Rotta - Cap3: La Fluidità del Voto in Italia 2022 - Studocu
